statements: SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, timestamp FROM access_logs WHERE activity_type = 'login';
SELECT timestamp, activity_type, access_level FROM access_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, access_level FROM access_logs WHERE security_violation = TRUE;
SELECT DISTINCT access_level FROM access_logs;
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 123 AND security_violation = TRUE ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT timestamp, activity_type FROM access_logs WHERE access_level = 'Admin' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, timestamp, activity_type FROM access_logs WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, access_level FROM access_logs WHERE activity_type LIKE '%login%' ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT AVG(user_id) AS average_user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM access_logs GROUP BY access_level HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY total_logs DESC;
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT log_id, user_id, access_time FROM access_logs ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT action, resource FROM access_logs WHERE resource LIKE '%admin%' AND action = 'login';
SELECT user_id, access_time FROM access_logs WHERE access_time BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY access_time ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(log_id) AS log_count FROM access_logs GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY log_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY access_time DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT log_id, access_time, action FROM access_logs WHERE action = 'login' AND access_time BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30'
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_actions FROM access_logs GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_actions DESC
SELECT a.*, r.report_type FROM access_logs a JOIN user_reports r ON a.user_id = r.user_id WHERE r.report_date = '2022-01-15' AND a.action = 'download'
SELECT a.user_id, a.resource, r.details FROM access_logs a LEFT JOIN user_reports r ON a.user_id = r.user_id WHERE r.user_id IS NULL
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT action, timestamp FROM access_logs WHERE log_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM access_logs GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_activities WHERE activity_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT violation_id, violation_type FROM security_violations WHERE violation_timestamp >= '2022-07-01';
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, action, COUNT(*) AS total_actions FROM access_logs GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_actions DESC
SELECT a.user_id, a.activity_description, v.violation_type FROM user_activities a JOIN security_violations v ON a.user_id = v.user_id
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_violations FROM security_violations GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_violations > 5
SELECT user_id, MIN(activity_timestamp) AS first_activity, MAX(activity_timestamp) AS last_activity FROM user_activities GROUP BY user_id
SELECT * FROM access_logs;
SELECT id, user_id, action, timestamp FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_access FROM access_logs GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT DISTINCT(user_id), COUNT(*) AS total_violations FROM security_violations WHERE violation_type = 'Unauthorized Access';
SELECT pattern_name, access_count FROM access_patterns ORDER BY access_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, action FROM access_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' and action LIKE '%login%' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT pattern_name, access_count FROM access_patterns WHERE access_count > 100 ORDER BY access_count DESC;
SELECT user_id, violation_type, COUNT(*) as violation_count FROM security_violations GROUP BY user_id, violation_type ORDER BY violation_count DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_title, description FROM user_activities WHERE activity_title ILIKE '%update%' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM access_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, action FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT pattern_name, timestamp FROM access_patterns WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT violation_type, description FROM security_violations ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT activity_type FROM compliance_monitoring WHERE user_id = 2002;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM user_activities WHERE activity_name = 'Login' OR activity_name = 'Logout' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, pattern_name FROM access_patterns WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY user_id, timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM security_violations WHERE violation_type LIKE '%Unauthorized%' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, activity_type, resource_id FROM compliance_monitoring WHERE resource_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY activity_type, timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
